content.data:
[Y]Arcade Blasters
[W]Speed, colour, instant reactions.
[c][m.]
[W]Great arcade games reward quick reads
[W]and tighter input than flashy intros.
[W]Mode and palette choices should
[W]improve visibility, not just
[W]spectacle.
[c][m.]
[G]- Readable bullets.
[G]- Fair hitboxes.
[G]- Strong sound cues.
[m][m-]
[Y]GAME DESIGN
[C]One more go is the true success
[C]metric.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
